p: The human lung fibroblast cell line MRC-5 was cultured in DMEM (Sigma-Aldrich, São Paulo) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum and 1% antibiotics (5 mg.ml -1 penicillin, 5 mg.ml -1 streptomycin, and 10 mg.ml -1 neomycin; Gibco/Invitrogen, Minneapolis, MN, USA). The cells were cultured in an incubator with a humidified atmosphere containing 5% CO₂ at 37°C.
